name: ColoRythms
description:
COLORYTHMS
Target
Main goal - to provide transportation of particles of a certain color into the corresponding receivers. Generator generates particles, which can have up to five different colors. For the transportation of particles need to use switches and rotators (click with the left or right mouse buttons). During the game, press Tab to enter the menu.

Controls:
Left and right mouse buttons.
Key "Tab" to enter the menu.

Clickable objects
Rotator:

Click left mouse button will drive rotator clockwise direction. Click right mouse button will drive rotator counterclockwise direction.

Switcher:

Click left mouse button will change direction on clockwise. Click right mouse button will change direction counterclockwise.

Main elements
Generator - generates particles with random color.

Particle has random color.

Rotator capture particles and rotate them with mouse buttons.

Magnet attract particles. Red magnet attract only red particles, blue magnet attract only blue particles, green magnet attract only green particles.

The receiver is the place where particles must be delivered. Red receiver allow get only red particles, green receiver only green particles. White receiver allow get all kind of particles.

The direction indicator sets the direction of motion for the particles.

Switcher with mouse buttons sets the direction of motion for the particles.

Color changer randomly change particle color.

The color controller has its own color and allows particles to pass through him with a color identical to the colors of the controller.

Splitter - splits particle without color on 3 color particles.

In main game menu see "Info" page for how to play instruction.

You can download the standalone version of the game.

To install the game follow steps:

Download the zip file

Unzip the file

Launch "Colorythms.exe"

In the folder with the game is a file "How to play" with instructions.

Background music from PlayOnLoop.com
